tool_description: Global holiday date prediction service. Holiday and Business Day data for App and blockchain developers.
name: Holiday Oracle
title: Holiday Oracle

api_list.name: date/locations
api_list.description: Returns a list of supported countries and subdivisions for the Date Group API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://holiday-oracle.p.rapidapi.com/date/locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "holiday-oracle.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://holiday-oracle.p.rapidapi.com/date/locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "holiday-oracle.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: date/business-days
api_list.description: Calculates the number of business days, holidays and weekend days between two given dates.

api_list.name: date
date/holidays
api_list.description: The holidays endpoint returns a list of holidays for the specified country, year and optional subdivision.
